title: (x) Wohnungsbau Genossenshaften - (similar to) Mahlau {MarkS}
content:
Hi there,   
   
Has anybody of you an idea what font this could be. Im thinking of something like a Futura "clone".   
Maybe its handdrawn/constructed.   
   
Thanks in advance   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826045547im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22472.jpg)
author: daniel_gï¿½nther

comments.content:
It's probably handdrawn.   
Mark's [Mostra](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826045547/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/) is a nice digital alternative.

At the risk of steering you away from Mostra (thanks, Yves and Eduardo, for suggesting it), you might also look at [Mahlau](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826045547/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=203482), which appears to be a closer match, especially if you want those S's.
